text:
After installing Apache 2.0.42 and Tomcat 4.1.12, I ran into a problem after 
restarting my machine (which is running Windows 2000 build 2195, service pack 
2).  Tomcat cannot be stopped or started from the Windows services manager.  
The services manager will say that Tomcat has been started or stopped, but 
there's no change to Tomcat's status.  Starting and stopping Tomcat manually 
works fine.
creator: esperry@esri.com
remm@apache.org
text:
This works fine for me on a pretty typical system. Please post on tomcat-user to
investigate, as this is likely a problem with the setup of the machine or
something (likely the JVM was incorrectly detected during Tomcat setup).
